    protected static class Implementation.Context.Default.FieldSetterDelegation
extends Implementation.Context.Default.DelegationRecord
    An implementation for a field setter.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • FieldSetterDelegation

        protected FieldSetterDelegation(TypeDescription instrumentedType,
                                String suffix,
                                MethodAccessorFactory.AccessType accessType,
                                FieldDescription fieldDescription)
        Creates a new field setter implementation.
        参数:
        instrumentedType - The instrumented type.
        suffix - The suffix to use for the setter method.
        accessType - The method's access type.
        fieldDescription - The field to write to.

    • 方法详细资料

      • with

        protected Implementation.Context.Default.DelegationRecord with(MethodAccessorFactory.AccessType accessType)
        从类复制的说明: Implementation.Context.Default.DelegationRecord
        Returns this delegation record with the minimal visibility represented by the supplied access type.
        指定者:
        with 在类中 Implementation.Context.Default.DelegationRecord
        参数:
        accessType - The access type to enforce.
        返回:
        A new version of this delegation record with the minimal implied visibility.

      • apply

        public ByteCodeAppender.Size apply(MethodVisitor methodVisitor,
                                   Implementation.Context implementationContext,
                                   MethodDescription instrumentedMethod)
        从接口复制的说明: ByteCodeAppender
        Applies this byte code appender to a type creation process.
        参数:
        methodVisitor - The method visitor to which the byte code appender writes its code to.
        implementationContext - The implementation context of the current type creation process.
        instrumentedMethod - The method that is the target of the instrumentation.
        返回:
        The required size for the applied byte code to run.
